workshoptitle: Easy Text Search over Multiple Tables with DBMS_SEARCH in 23ai

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This is an introduction to Oracle Database 23ai.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create the sample schemas
tutorials.description: Creating the sample schemas for our search index

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create a DBMS_SEARCH index
tutorials.description: Create an index, add some tables and explore the index

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Run queries using the DBMS_SEARCH index
tutorials.description: Explore different types of queries using the search index
